title: 'No more handouts for woke corporations': Disney's special copyright protections could be killed

sentence: Disney has been an outspoken critic of the measure, going so far as to say its goal as a company? is having the bill repealed by the legislature or struck down in the courts.? In return, Florida stripped Disney of its independent special district? status, with Governor Ron DeSantis warning that if the company chose to use its economic might to attack the parents of my state,? he would treat it as a provocation? and fight back.? Senator Josh Hawley (R., Mo.)

sentence: At a signing ceremony for the measure, Governor Ron DeSantis said that if Disney was going to use its economic might to attack the parents of my state,? he would treat it as a provocation? and fight back.? He also said that even if Disney had not commented on the Parental Rights Bill, taking away its special status would have been the right thing to do.? Representative Jim Banks (R., IN.
